alert.note: Alert for Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 1:16PM PST until January 13 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South to southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeast Jackson County including the southern end of the Rogue Valley from South Medford to Ashland and all surrounding foothills. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
